Instance Property# pageRef

iOS 11.0+iPadOS 11.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.4+tvOS 11.0+visionOS 1.0+

```
var pageRef: CGPDFPage? { get }
```

## [See Also](/documentation/PDFKit/PDFPage/pageRef#see-also)

### [Instance Properties](/documentation/PDFKit/PDFPage/pageRef#Instance-Properties)

[`var dataRepresentation: Data?`](/documentation/pdfkit/pdfpage/datarepresentation)Returns the PDF data (that is, a PDF document) representing this page. This method does not preserve external page links.
